name: Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Camera
description: Capture sharp, detailed images and high-definition videos with the Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Camera. It features a 24.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor, DIGIC 4+ image processor, and Full HD 1080p video recording capabilities.

name: Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra
description: Experience the power of 5G connectivity and professional-grade camera capabilities with the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra. Its 108MP quad camera system allows you to capture stunning photos and 8K videos, while its 6.9-inch Dynamic AMOLED display delivers immersive visuals.

name: Apple MacBook Pro (2020)
description: Enhance your productivity and creativity with the Apple MacBook Pro. Featuring a stunning Retina display, powerful Intel processors, and all-day battery life, it's perfect for students, professionals, and creatives alike.
